abstract: Justice Dept wins dismissal of defamation lawsuit by shipping magnate Victor Restis against anti-Iran advocacy group United Against Nuclear Iran after claiming case could imperil national security by revealing state secrets.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department asked that a lawsuit be dismissed to prevent state secrets from being revealed.

headline.main: To Protect State Secrets, Judge Dismisses Suit
headline.print_headline: To Protect Secrets, Judge Dismisses Suit

snippet: The Justice Department asked that a lawsuit be dismissed to prevent state secrets from being revealed.
